coded_answer.p: Thank you for the letter. It was great to hear from you. I was surprised that I have won.
By the way, I would like to travel in July, because just II just have free time in July. Moreover, I am keen on in summer.

As can be seen from your letter, I can choose Accommodation. I would prefer to stay in tents. One reason why I choose tents is that I can feel wild lifewildlifenature more than if I stay in log cabins.

According to your letter, there are 10 main activities which I can choose 2 and play while I am on the holiday. I would like to play Basketball and Golf. Both of them I am not as good as you expect, but recently I have been intrestedinterested in thosethem.

Finally, I would like to ask some questionquestions such as about clothes and money. What kind of clothes are much to the camp? Furthermore, this is the first time I have been to abroad, therefore I don't know how much money I should bring.
I am looking forward to hearing from you
How have you been doing recently.? I have been busy anyway. I want to tell you how much I enjoyed helping at a pop concert.

It was at the beginingbeginning of this summer. One of my friends suggested that we should have had a part timepart-time job, which was that. Both of us are keen on pop music. Although at first I didn't wandwant to do it, because it was in summer. It must have been hot.
HoweveHowever, we decided to have the job, because of good money.
HoweveHowever, it was a great job. I haven't hade such a great experience before. I could see a great number of pop stars in front of us. Can you believe that.?
My job just prepearprepareto prepare drinkdrinks for them. Moreover, one of the famous stars gave me a signsignature. I will never forget at that time.
I must sign off as I want to catch the post.
Could you being in touch and send back a letter.
